name: SimRepo
description: Web extension enhancing GitHub by showing similar projects in a repository's sidebar
readme_summary: SimRepo is a web extension that enhances GitHub by suggesting similar repositories in the sidebar of a repository page. It also provides personalized recommendations on the user's home page based on their starred repositories. The extension uses machine learning and vector embeddings to find similar projects, improving discoverability and exploration of GitHub repositories.
key_features: Provides similar repositories for repositories with more than 150 stars
Adds recommendations on your home page based on your latest stars
primary_use_case: Enhancing GitHub by showing similar projects in a repository's sidebar and providing personalized recommendations.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a librarian in a vast, futuristic library, surrounded by towering shelves filled with glowing books (repositories). The librarian holds a special magnifying glass that highlights connections between books, revealing similar titles and suggesting new reads based on the user's past selections. Small screens embedded in the shelves display repository details and user star histories. The scene is bathed in soft, ethereal light, creating a sense of discovery and connection. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and intricate details, subtly incorporating the SimRepo logo.

name: claude-task-master
description: An AI-powered task-management system you can drop into Cursor, Lovable, Windsurf, Roo, and others.
readme_summary: Task Master is an AI-powered task management system designed to integrate seamlessly with Cursor AI and other IDEs. It allows developers to manage and prioritize tasks using AI, leveraging various AI providers through API key configuration. The system provides comprehensive documentation and a one-click installation option for Cursor, streamlining the setup process.
key_features: Integration with Cursor AI and other IDEs
Customizable configuration with API keys for various AI providers
primary_use_case: AI-driven development task management, particularly within the Cursor AI environment.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing a bustling construction site where digital tasks are being meticulously organized and managed. The architect holds a blueprint displaying a clear task hierarchy, while robotic arms efficiently sort and prioritize tasks represented as glowing blocks. A large screen in the background displays a clean, intuitive task management interface with AI insights. The scene is set in a bright, futuristic workshop with a focus on clarity and efficiency. Small UI elements and code snippets are subtly incorporated to connect the metaphor to software development. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: magic
description: The first open-source all-in-one AI productivity platform (Generalist AI Agent + Workflow Engine + IM + Online collaborative office system)
readme_summary: Magic is an open-source, all-in-one AI productivity platform designed to help enterprises rapidly develop and deploy AI applications. It features a general-purpose AI Agent, a visual workflow orchestration system, and an integrated instant messaging system. The platform also includes tools like an AI Agent framework and an HTML to Markdown converter, providing a comprehensive suite for AI-driven productivity enhancement.
key_features: Enterprise-grade instant messaging with AI Agent integration (Magic IM)
HTML to Markdown conversion tool (Magic Lens)
primary_use_case: Quickly build and deploy AI applications to achieve a 100x increase in productivity for enterprises of all sizes.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled architect overseeing a bustling construction site where AI agents are diligently building a magnificent skyscraper. The architect, representing the platform, reviews blueprints (workflows) displayed on a holographic screen, ensuring seamless integration. Each agent, a specialized worker, contributes unique skills: one lays bricks (data processing), another installs windows (communication), and a third designs the interior (task planning). The skyscraper, symbolizing increased productivity, rises majestically towards the sky. Subtle UI elements and code snippets float around the scene, grounding it in technology. The illustration should be in a vibrant, 3D isometric style with clear details and a focus on collaboration and efficiency.

name: raspirus
description: A user- and resources-friendly rules-based malware scanner
readme_summary: Raspirus is a rules-based malware scanner designed for user-friendliness and resource efficiency. Originally intended for scanning USB drives with a Raspberry Pi, it has evolved into a versatile tool capable of scanning local files and folders across multiple platforms, emphasizing privacy and speed.
primary_use_case: Malware scanning of local files, folders, and USB drives.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a diligent robotic hound, nose to the ground, sniffing out malware threats represented as shadowy figures lurking within a vibrant, digital garden. The hound wears a small screen displaying real-time scan results. USB drives sprout like metallic flowers, some wilting under the hound's scrutiny, indicating detected threats. The garden is subtly overlaid with a grid of code, and the repository name, 'Raspirus,' is etched into a stone pathway. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused light, creating a sense of security and vigilance. Render in a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with bright, contrasting colors.
